company_description: Zego is an insurtech company that provides insurance products tailored for gig economy workers and businesses in the sharing economy, such as delivery drivers and ride-hailing services.
founders: Harry Franks, Sten Saar, Stuart Kelly
universities: Newcastle Uni, Tallin University, Griffith University
embedding_text: Zego is an insurtech company that provides insurance products tailored for gig economy workers and businesses in the sharing economy, such as delivery drivers and ride-hailing services.
